src:
Hasil Pertandingan PSIS Semarang vs PSS Sleman: Skor 3-0
02 Nov 2019, 17:41 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSIS Semarang menghadapi PSS Sleman di Stadion Maguwoharjo pada pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 2019, Sabtu (2/11/2019). PSIS menang tiga gol tanpa balas.
PSIS membuka keunggulan lewat penalti Wallace Costa menit 22. Setelah itu, PSIS mencetak dua gol tambahan untuk memastikan kemenangan 3-0 melalui Claudir Marini menit 38 dan Septian David Maulana menit 74.
PSIS sejatinya kurang diuntungkan dalam laga ini. Walau berstatus tuan rumah, mereka tampil di markas PSS. Namun, skuat Mahesa Jenar mampu menjawab tantangan tersebut.
Dalam laga ini, PSIS memang tampil dengan kekuatan penuh, termasuk dengan empat pemain asing, Bruno Silva, Wallace Costa, Claudir Marini Jr., dan Jonathan Cantillana. Sementara, PSS tanpa gelandang andalan mereka, Brian Ferreira.
PSIS membuka keunggulan lewat gol Wallace Costa dari titik penalti. Claudir Marini Jr menggandakan keunggulan PSIS. PSIS pun menutup babak pertama dengan skor 2-0.
Babak kedua, PSIS tak mengendurkan serangan. Walau berjalan alot, PSIS tetap bisa menambah skor lewat aksi Septian David Maulana.
PSIS berhasil mempertahankan skor 3-0 hingga babak kedua berakhir. Dengan demikian, PSIS Semarang sukses meraih dua kemenangan ketika bersua PSS. Pada putaran pertama, mereka menang 3-1.
text:
PSIS Semarang vs PSS Sleman Results: Score 3-0
02 Nov 2019, 17:41 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSIS Semarang faces Sleman PSS at Maguwoharjo Stadium in the 26th week of Shopee Liga 1 2019, Saturday (11/2/2019). PSIS won three goals without reply.
PSIS opened the scoring through a Wallace Costa penalty on 22 minutes. After that, PSIS scored two additional goals to secure a 3-0 victory through Claudir Marini 38 minutes and Septian David Maulana 74 minutes.
PSIS is actually disadvantaged in this fight. Despite the status of the host, they performed at the PSS headquarters. However, Mahesa Jenar's squad was able to answer the challenge.
In this fight, PSIS did appear in full force, including with four foreign players, Bruno Silva, Wallace Costa, Claudir Marini Jr., and Jonathan Cantillana. Meanwhile, PSS without their mainstay midfielder, Brian Ferreira.
PSIS opened the scoring through Wallace Costa's goal from the penalty spot. Claudir Marini Jr doubles the superiority of PSIS. PSIS also closed the first round with a score of 2-0.
The second half, PSIS did not relax the attack. Even though it was tough, PSIS was still able to increase the score through the Septian David Maulana action.
PSIS managed to maintain the score 3-0 until the second half ended. Thus, PSIS Semarang successfully won two wins when PSS met. In the first round, they won 3-1.
